Description:
Required Skills to be successful:Job-Specific Technical Skills:Should possess hands-on experience in the installation, configuration, and commissioning of AV Systems, including Speakers, Amplifiers, Projection systems, Direct LED Displays, Video walls, Control Systems, and Automation Systems.
Have a mechanical aptitude and demonstrate a clear understanding of AUDIO & VIDEO systems installation methods and best practices.
Knowledge of various components and sub-components of AUDIO & VIDEO System, especially Extron Crestron, AMX, BIAMP etc. 
Detailed working knowledge and experience in Operations and Maintenance of AUDIO & VIDEO systems
Fault Finding & troubleshooting skills in AUDIO & VIDEO Systems.
General knowledge and experience of Electrical Safety Rules and procedures.
The ability to accurately read and interpret drawings & schematics.
Experience with other technology systems, such as Structure cabling & AV, is a plus.
Technical training & certifications from manufacturers on AUDIO & VIDEO System is a plus.
Crestron, Extron, AMX, BOSE, BIAMP programming skills is a plus. Behavioural Competencies :Detail-oriented and strong analytical skills.
Excellent problem-solving skills
Excellent interpersonal skills
Excellent time management.
Ability to work extended hours (overtime/weekends) as needed.
Ability to be scheduled for on-call status if or as needed.
The position may require daily travel to worksites, and employees must be able to get to worksites independently.
Provide professional and courteous interaction with customers.
Team Player.Job Details
